item.title: WATCH: A 14-year-old running for governor of Vermont
item.description: Vermont is the only state without a minimum age requirement for gubernatorial runs, so Dean Roy created his own party to ensure he gets on the ballot.

item.title: WATCH: 45 million Americans under alerts as new storms take aim
item.description: A powerful winter storm slamming the Northern Plains and Midwest created dangerous road conditions. In the West, an atmospheric river has brought up t...

item.title: WATCH: Plane crash lands on I-95 in Florida, hits car
item.description: The small plane experienced a "loss of power in both engines," according to the NTSB.

item.title: Divided Fed set to announce decision on interest rates
item.description: Inflation as picked up in recent months alongside a hiring slowdown.

item.title: In the dark and under fire, Ukraine strains to keep the lights on
item.description: Millions of Ukrainians have been plunged into periodic darkness and cold as Russian drones and missiles wage a systematic long-range campaign.
